00148 inline Region Region::operator+ (const Region& region) const
00149 {
00150     Region temp;
00151     
00152     for ( std::vector<PixelCoordinates>::const_iterator i = this->coordinates_.begin(); i not_eq coordinates_.end(); ++i )
00153         temp.addCoordinates( (*i) );
00154     
00155     for ( std::vector<PixelCoordinates>::const_iterator i = region.coordinates_.begin(); i not_eq region.coordinates_.end(); ++i )
00156         temp.addCoordinates( (*i) );
00157     
00158     return temp;
00159 };

00162 inline bool Region::operator< (const Region& region) const
00163 {
00164     if ( this->bottomBorderRow() < region.topBorderRow() )
00165         return true;
00166     else
00167     {
00168         if ( region.bottomBorderRow() < this->topBorderRow() )
00169             return false;
00170         else
00171             return ( this->topLeftmostPixelCoordinates().second < region.topLeftmostPixelCoordinates().second );
00172     }
00173 };
